ABOUT.TITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.INTRO: Hi, I’m Marc. I’m passionate about turning ideas into interactive digital experiences. Coding gives me the freedom to build, explore, and improve — one line at a time.
ABOUT.LOCATION: I am based in Duisburg. Here, I work on personal and collaborative projects that challenge me to grow every day.
ABOUT.OPEN_MINDED: I’m open-minded and enthusiastic about learning new technologies. Whether it’s a new framework, design trend, or performance tweak — I’m always curious and committed to sharpening my skills.
ABOUT.PROBLEM_SOLVER: Problem-solving is where I thrive. I approach challenges with creativity, persistence, and a collaborative mindset. I believe great solutions come from asking the right questions and building on every failure.

DESCRIPTION.PART1: I have experience working with a range of front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Angular and Bootstrap. I enjoy building responsive, user-friendly interfaces that combine clean code with strong design principles.
DESCRIPTION.PART2: I’m always open to learning new tools and approaches — whether it’s a modern framework, a new build process, or best practices in UX. For me, staying up to date with the rapid evolution of web development isn’t just important — it’s essential. I see change as an opportunity to grow and improve with every project.

PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Featured Projects
PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

CONTACT.TITLE: Get in Touch
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you want to collaborate or have any questions, feel free to reach out!
